#Text=Many fans would deem the character of Nina as the  beleaguered heroine . "

column1: #Text=Do you think that assessment is on the mark , or were there other facets to her character that you feel were integral to your portrayal of her that deserve note ?
#Text=No one wants every character to be " together . "
#Text=For a time while you were on the show , you ( and Nina ) gained some weight .
#Text=In the storyline , Ryan had left Nina for Tricia [ Dennison , played by Sabryn Genet ] , and she became convinced she was unattractive and unloved .
#Text=Was that a difficult storyline to act out ?
#Text=Also , what kind of fan reaction did you receive while playing that sort of storyline , as it related to female viewers and their own self-image concerns ?
#Text=It was tough because it was so close to home .
#Text=I struggled with my weight off camera and that was n't fun .
#Text=I got both supportive reaction and a measure of cruelty come my way over it .
#Text=Some people love you no matter what and some people just do n't like their TV personalities to be less than perfect .
